title: Google Login Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using Firebase Authentication with Google login.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click the 'Sign in with Google' button.
Verify that the user is authenticated and redirected to the main application interface.

title: Google Login Authentication Failure Handling
description: Verify proper error handling when Google login fails due to network or user cancellation.

steps.description: Initiate Google login process.
Simulate network failure or user cancels the login.
Confirm that a meaningful error message is displayed to the user and login is not successful.

title: Onboarding Modal Displays and Saves User Preferences
description: Validate onboarding modal appears on first login and correctly captures language and content type preferences.

steps.description: Login to the app as a new user.
Verify that the onboarding modal is displayed.
Select a language preference and content type.
Confirm the selections.
Verify that the preferences are saved and applied to the learning experience.

title: Sidebar Navigation Displays Correct Vocabulary Stack Counts
description: Ensure the sidebar accurately shows all vocabulary stacks with real-time word counts.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the main interface.
Verify the sidebar displays all vocabulary stacks: Red, Yellow, Green, Important, Sentences with correct counts.
Add and remove words from vocabulary stacks.
Confirm the sidebar updates counts in real-time to reflect changes.

title: AI Chat Generates Contextual Responses Using Gemini API
description: Verify that the AI chat responds appropriately to user input with Gemini API generated answers.

steps.description: Navigate to the AI chat interface.
Enter a language learning related query into the chat input.
Send the message.
Verify that a response is received that is relevant and contextually appropriate.

title: Clickable Vocabulary Words in Chat Expand WordCard Popup
description: Check that clicking vocabulary words in AI chat responses opens the WordCard popup with correct details.

steps.description: Trigger AI chat response containing vocabulary words.
Click on a vocabulary word within the chat response.
Verify the WordCard popup opens displaying the correct word details.

title: WordCard Radial Menu Updates Word Status and Flags
description: Validate that the WordCard radial menu correctly updates word statuses (Red, Yellow, Green, Important) and saves example sentences.

steps.description: Open WordCard popup for a vocabulary word.
Use the radial menu to change word status across all possible states.
Confirm that the status update is reflected immediately in the UI and persisted.
Mark the word as Important using the radial menu.
Verify the Important flag is updated and saved.
Add an example sentence and save it.
Ensure the sentence is stored and displayed correctly.
Play the pronunciation audio from the radial menu.
Verify audio plays without errors.

title: Vocabulary Stack Real-time Firestore Synchronization
description: Verify that vocabulary stack updates sync instantly with Firebase Firestore and UI reflects changes without manual refresh.

steps.description: Modify the vocabulary data by adding, editing, or deleting words in one client instance.
Confirm data is updated in Firestore immediately.
Verify other client instances reflect these changes in the UI in real-time.

title: Create, Edit, Comment, and Like Posts in Community
description: Test full lifecycle of community posts, including creation, editing, commenting, and liking, ensuring data persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to community feed.
Create a new post with a title and content.
Verify the post appears in the feed.
Edit the created post and update content.
Confirm changes are saved and visible.
Add a comment to the post.
Verify comment appears under the post.
Like the post.
Ensure the like count increments and persists after reload.

title: Edit User Profile in Community Feature
description: Ensure that user profile can be edited and changes persist and reflect across the app.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile page.
Edit user details including display name, avatar, and bio.
Save changes.
Verify changes persist after page reload and appear correctly in community posts and chats.

title: Send and Receive Messages in Global Chat Room
description: Verify real-time messaging capability in the global chat room with immediate sending and receiving of messages.

steps.description: Enter the global chat room.
Send a message.
Verify the message appears immediately in the chat log.
Open another client logged in as a different user.
Verify the sent message appears in real-time in the other client's chat window.

title: One-to-One Direct Chat Messaging Functionality
description: Confirm 1:1 direct chat allows users to exchange messages in real time with persistence.

steps.description: Open or initiate a direct chat room with another user.
Send a message.
Verify message is delivered and displayed in real-time.
Receive message from the other user.
Confirm message appears instantly in the chat window.
Refresh the app.
Verify chat history persists and is loaded correctly.

title: Error Handling for Firestore Data Sync Failures
description: Test application behavior when Firestore synchronization fails during vocabulary update or chat messaging.

steps.description: Simulate Firestore network failure while updating vocabulary or sending chat messages.
Perform vocabulary update or attempt to send a message.
Verify that a clear error notification is displayed and unsent changes are marked or retried appropriately.
